result.execSummary:
The defendant Dylan W Dzwonkowski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs and DNA to be paid on a payment plan at $50.00 per month commencing 1/15/2017; alternate to costs 9 days jail; alternate to DNA civil judgment to be entered.

Release for work only.
1 day credit.
Consecutive to: any other sentence

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dylan W Dzwonkowski

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dylan W Dzwonkowski in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

  The defendant was sentenced to the following:

HUBER: 60 days, release for work only (Credit - 1). Consecutive to any current sentence.

FINE: $ 253.00 (to be paid at rate of $50/month commencing (1/15/17) or serve 9 days jail, consecutive, as penalty for non payment of fine);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $200.00, to be paid at $50/month consecutive to payment of fine or to be converted to a civil judgment for non payment of surcharge.

ADDRESS INFO for Dylan W Dzwonkowski
Current: c/o Waukesha Co Jail,   (Effective: 03-21-2016)
Prior: 2030 Cliff-Alex Ct S,#c, Waukesha, WI 53189
Sentencing hearing on April 4, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Dylan W Dzwonkowski in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters a guilty plea to the charge and the state moves to strike the repeater allegation. Defense counsel is requesting a separate sentencing hearing date. Court grants.   Bail remains as fixed.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 9, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Jorge R Fragoso in court.   Defendant Dylan W Dzwonkowski did not appear.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournment so his client can finish his treatment program. State has no objections. Court grants.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Joseph Smith, Jr. for Jorge R Fragoso in court.   Defendant Dylan W Dzwonkowski did not appear.   Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense counsel is requesting adjournmnet for 45 days.   Court ordered a capias stayed until next court date. Attorney to file authorization by the end of the week.  Hearing scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness or Walmart Store listed in the Criminal Complaint.   Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.

Defendant Dylan W Dzwonkowski in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 09:00 am.
